page.title: 05FECKENHAM COFE FIRST SCHOOL3
page.content:
MY DAY -THE HEADMISTRESS -CONT
After assembly we start work. I have 18 children in my class, varying in age from 4 to 7. The children are divided in groups for work and the work is integrated. At break the two of staff share playground duty. The children can play all round the school and on the garden. We all have lunch together in the hall. The parents cook the lunches on a rota system, and they are delicious. After lunch during my dinner break I make telephone calls and sign the letters the secretary has left for me. In the afternoon we have P E and games. Then we have a story before we go home. I am usually at school until about 4.30 unless I have a meeting. Then I take the paperwork home to do.
